body: Hello Mostapha, thank you for the reply. Well of course I know about the possibility to read the characteristic of the Radiance material but I mean in the case we don't apply any Radiance material. So the question is what is the reflectance of the default materials. I say this also because I get an error when I use the  component Get from radiance library. So I thought I get this error because the default materials are not Radiance materials properly defined. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/RBh5pTSdbmuSxPvK3tL4tima6QrbmkQHU6bM1Rd-vqPJly0UTYh2-RWsy6Yc4HMB9zgdLz4kFrQfXX2k6ikmNJv0WJUTj6zp/Untitled1.jpg) Best, Francesco
